name: Dimension
description: TGRDM1, is a large Deathmatch map set. This file is the first public release that I have ever done. Version 1.00: 21 February. 2006 Original release Version 1.01: 26 April. 2008 Fixed all bad vertices Unversioned Updates: 23 November. 2012 Renamed project TGRDM1b -> TGRDM1 Thrashed a superfluous lump Reorganized the map lumps Version 1.04: 25 November. 2012 Ported the project to ZDoom! Resources used from: * Weapons Realm667 Resources * Spheres Realm667 Resources * Textures SkullTag * Some decorations SkullTag Resources Sadly, not everything was ported over: Runes, and some armor and health bonuses. Converted images to PNG format. Project Name or Codename has been changed to: Dimension
